description.p: You are a notorious free adventurer who, due to unfortunate circumstances, has lost favor with the law. However, being of the common people, they protect you due to your just nature. A protector of the people, a thorn in the side of authorities.
Work with your DM to determine what events caused you to become an outlaw.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies:Choose two from Acrobatics, Athletics, Insight, and Survival
Tool Proficiencies: Disguise kit (or artificer's tools if playing a renegade Jedi)
Equipment:A hunting trap, an iron pot, a set of traveler's clothes, and a pouch containing 150 cr (15 gp)

description.p: Somewhere along the way, a single defining moment marked your beginnings as an outlaw.

tr.td: I stood up to a tyrant’s agents.
I stole from a corrupt Lord to help the poor.
I broke into a tyrant's castle and stole weapons to arm the people.
I failed to assassinate a tyrant.
I loved a noble, and was caught in bed with them.
I robbed a bank with unfair interest rates.
I murdered a pedophilic priest to save local children.
I received a heroic calling from a mysterious creature.
I was framed for a crime I didn't commit.

description.p: An outlaw is a hero for the common people who takes pride in his humble origins and revels in disrupting authority to help those he's close to.

setters.set: Choice of 2 of Acrobatics, Athletics, Insight, Survival, 1 Language

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I judge people by their actions, not their words.
If someone is in trouble, I'm always ready to lend help.
When I set my mind to something, I follow through no matter what gets in my way.
I have a strong sense of fair play and always try to find the most equitable solution to arguments.
I'm confident in my own abilities and do what I can to instill confidence in others.
Thinking is for other people. I prefer action.
I misuse long words in an attempt to sound smarter.
I get bored easily. When am I going to get on with my destiny?

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Respect. People deserve to be treated with dignity and respect. (Light)
Fairness. No one should get preferential treatment before the law, and no one is above the law. (Lawful)
Freedom. Tyrants must not be allowed to oppress the people. (Chaotic)
Might. If I become strong, I can take what I want - what I deserve. (Dark)
Sincerity. There's no good in pretending to be something I'm not. (Neutral)
Destiny. Nothing and no one can steer me away from my higher calling. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I have a family, but I have no idea where they are. One day, I hope to see them again.
I worked the land, I love the land, and I will protect the land.
A proud noble once gave me a horrible beating, and I will take my revenge on any bully I encounter.
My tools are symbols of my past life, and I carry them so that I will never forget my roots.
I protect those who cannot protect themselves.
I wish my childhood sweetheart had come with me to pursue my destiny.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: The tyrant who rules my land will stop at nothing to see me killed.
I'm convinced of the significance of my destiny, and blind to my shortcomings and the risk of failure.
The people who knew me when I was young know my shameful secret, so I can never go home again.
I have a weakness for the vices of the city, especially hard drink.
Secretly, I believe that things would be better if I were a tyrant lording over the land.
I have trouble trusting in my allies.

description.p: Since you come from the ranks of the common folk, you fit among them with ease. You can find a place to hide, rest, or recuperate among other commoners, unless you’ve shown yourself to be a danger to them. They will shield you from the law or anyone else searching for you, though they will not risk their lives for you.

You are an acolyte of the Sith Order: an ancient order of Force-wielders devoted to the dark side of the Force. Emerging as a divergent faction to the Jedi Order, the Sith are mortal enemies of the Jedi and fight against them. Driven by emotions such as hate, anger, and greed, the Sith are deceptive and ultimately obsessed with amassing power no matter the cost. You follow the Sith Code:
“Peace is a lie. There is only passion. Through passion I gain strength. Through strength I gain power. Through power I gain victory. Through victory my chains are broken. The Force shall free me.”

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies:Choose two from Deception, Insight, Intimidation, Religion, and Arcana
Equipment:A copy of the Sith code, a set of common clothes including a robe, and a belt pouch containing 150 cr (15 gp)

description.p: Sith are shaped by their training. They study the Sith code and use it to oppress the weak and quell resistance. Their study of the Sith code affects their mannerisms and ideals. Their flaws might be some hidden hypocrisy or heretical idea, or an ideal or bond taken to an extreme.

setters.set: Choice of Insight, Religion, Arcana, Deception, Intimidation, 1 Language

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I idolize a particular Sith, and constantly refer to that person's deeds and example.
I can find common ground between the fiercest enemies, empathizing with them and always working toward peace.
I see omens in every event and action. The Force tries to speak to us, we just need to listen
Nothing can shake my optimistic attitude.
I quote (or misquote) sacred Sith texts and proverbs in almost every situation.
I am tolerant (or intolerant) of those who don't support the Sith.
I've enjoyed fine food, drink, and high society. Rough living grates on me.
I've spent so long in the Sith temple that I have little practical experience dealing with people in the world.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Tradition. The ancient traditions of worship and sacrifice must be preserved and upheld. (Lawful)
Disdain. I never try to help those in need, regardless of how simple it would be. (Dark)
Change. We must help bring about the changes the Force is constantly working in the world. (Any)
Power. I hope to one day rise to the rank of Dark Lord of the Sith. (Any)
Faith. I trust that the Force will guide my actions; I have faith that if I work hard, things will go well. (Any)
Aspiration. I seek to prove myself worthy of the Force by matching my actions against the Sith teachings. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I would die to recover an ancient Sith relic that was lost long ago.
I will someday get revenge on those who razed my temple.
I owe my life to the Sith who took me in when my parents died.
Everything I do is for the common people.
I will do anything to protect the temple where I served.
I seek to preserve a sacred text that my enemies seek to destroy.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I judge others harshly, and myself even more severely.
I put too much trust in those who wield power within my temple’s hierarchy.
My piety sometimes leads me to blindly trust those that profess faith in the Force.
I am inflexible in my thinking.
I am suspicious of strangers and expect the worst of them.
Once I pick a goal, I become obsessed with it to the detriment of everything else in my life.

description.p: As a Sith, you instill fear in those who are aware of your standing. You and your adventuring companions can expect to receive free healing and care at any Sith temple, and those who are aware of your nature will support you (but only you) at a modest lifestyle.

You might also have ties to a specific Sith temple and have a residence there. This could be the temple where you trained, or a temple where you have found a new home. While near your temple, you can call upon the Sith for assistance, provided the assistance you ask for benefits them and you remain in good standing with your temple.

Before you became an adventurer, your life was already full of conflict and excitement, because you made a living tracking down people for pay. Unlike some people who collect bounties, though, you aren’t a savage who follows quarry into or through the wilderness. You’re involved in a lucrative trade, in the place where you live, that routinely tests your skills and survival instincts. What’s more, you aren’t alone, as a bounty hunter in the wild would be: you routinely interact with both the criminal subculture and other bounty hunters, maintaining contacts in both areas to help you succeed.

You might be a cunning thief-catcher, prowling the rooftops to catch one of the myriad burglars of the city. Perhaps you are someone who has your ear to the street, aware of the doings of street gangs. You might be a “velvet mask” bounty hunter, one who blends in with high society and noble circles in order to catch the criminals that prey on the rich, whether pickpockets or con artists. As a member of an adventuring party, you might find it more difficult to pursue a personal agenda that doesn’t fit with the group’s objectives - but on the other hand, you can take down much more formidable targets with the help of your companions.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Deception, Insight, Persuasion, and Stealth
Tool Proficiencies: Your choice of demolitions kit, security kit, or slicer's kit.
Equipment: A set of clothes appropriate to your duties, a set of binders, and a pouch containing 200 cr (20 gp)

description.p: Your bond might involve other bounty hunters or the organizations or individuals that employ you. Your ideal could be associated with your determination always to catch your quarry or your desire to maintain your reputation for being dependable.

setters.set: Choice of Deception, Stealth, Insight, Persuasion, choice of Security Kit, Slicer Kit, Demolitions Kit

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I always have a plan for what to do when things go wrong.
I am always calm, no matter what the situation. I never raise my voice or let my emotions control me.
The first thing I do in a new place is note the locations of everything valuable—or where such things could be hidden.
I would rather make a new friend than a new enemy.
I am incredibly slow to trust. Those who seem the fairest often have the most to hide.
I don’t pay attention to the risks in a situation. Never tell me the odds.
The best way to get me to do something is to tell me I can’t do it.
I blow up at the slightest insult.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Honor. I don’t steal from others in the trade. (Lawful)
Freedom. Chains are meant to be broken, as are those who would forge them. (Chaotic)
Charity. I steal from the wealthy so that I can help people in need. (Light)
Greed. I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy. (Dark)
People. I’m loyal to my friends, not to any ideals, and everyone else can take a trip down the Styx for all I care. (Neutral)
Redemption. There’s a spark of good in everyone. (Light)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I’m trying to pay off an old debt I owe to a generous benefactor.
My ill-gotten gains go to support my family.
Something important was taken from me, and I aim to steal it back.
I will become the greatest thief that ever lived.
I’m guilty of a terrible crime. I hope I can redeem myself for it.
Someone I loved died because of I mistake I made. That will never happen again.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: When I see something valuable, I can’t think about anything but how to steal it.
When faced with a choice between money and my friends, I usually choose the money.
If there’s a plan, I’ll forget it. If I don’t forget it, I’ll ignore it.
I have a “tell” that reveals when I’m lying.
I turn tail and run when things look bad.
An innocent person is in prison for a crime that I committed. I’m okay with that.

description.p: You are in frequent contact with people in the segment of society that your chosen quarries move through. These people might be associated with the criminal underworld, the rough-and-tumble folk of the streets, or members of high society. This connection comes in the form of a contact in any city you visit, a person who provides information about the people and places of the local area.

sheet.description: You are in frequent contact with people in the segment of society that your chosen quarries move through. These people might be associated with the criminal underworld, the rough-and-tumble folk of the streets, or members of high society. This connection comes in the form of a contact in any city you visit, a person who provides information about the people and places of the local area.

description.p: You are a child of Mandalore. As a member of the most renowned warrior culture in history, your people are known for being strong and hardy. Mandalorian culture is built around the honor and glory that come from victory in battle.

ul.li: Skill Proficiencies: Choose two from Deception, Insight, Piloting, and Stealth
Tool Proficiencies: Your choice of demolitions kit, security kit, or slicer's kit.
Equipment: A set of clothes appropriate to your duties, a set of binders, and a pouch containing 200 cr (20 gp)

description.p: Mandalorians are a meritocracy where birthplace, rank, status, and citizenship mean nothing. You are what you do. Mandalorians live by the Resol'nare (the "Six Actions"). As a true Mandalorian you should strive to live by this code as much as possible by remaining honorable. Your flaw(s) might consist of any dishonor you've committed, or even being too honorable.

setters.set: Choice of Deception, Stealth, Insight, Persuasion, choice of Security Kit, Slicer Kit, Demolitions Kit

select.name: Personality Trait
select.item: I try and bring my culture to outsiders.
I always put my clan first.
I follow the Resol'nare to the letter.
I love a good spar.
I enjoy traveling the galaxy.
I keep a small trophy on me to remind me of a past victory.
I view the Force as dishonorable in combat.
I've seen the horrors of battle and try to prevent it.

select.name: Ideal
select.item: Tradition. I live by my clan's ways, and will continue to do so. (Lawful)
Power. I strive to be the best warrior, no matter who stands in my way. (Dark)
Respect. I have earned the respect of many, and I intend to keep it. (Light)
Freedom. I enjoy having the ability to do whatever I want. (Chaotic)
Comradery. I'll put everything on the line for those dear to me. (Any)
Aspiration. I'll succeed in my goals, it just takes time and effort. (Any)

select.name: Bond
select.item: I lost someone dear to me in battle, I will always honor them.
Honor is everything to me.
I will lay down my life for those beside me.
I must keep the traditions of my ancestors alive.
No matter where I go, Mandalore is my home.
In death, I will find glory.

select.name: Flaw
select.item: I look down on outsiders.
I have no respect for anyone who flees. Cowardice is unacceptable.
I don't see much use in talking, a blaster is all I need to make my point.
I stick to my traditions no matter what, even at the cost of others.
I retreated once, and I've regretted it ever since.
I value a victory regardless of the ethics behind the victory.

description.p: Other Mandalorians know, and will look out for you. If you’re ever in need of a place to stay, or a meal to eat, other Mandalorians will help you as long as your clans aren’t feuding. This could be in the form of shelters, meals, even healing. If the Mandalorians are of your clan or a clan friendly to you, they may be willing to help you even at cost to themselves.

sheet.description: Other Mandalorians know, and will look out for you. If you’re ever in need of a place to stay, or a meal to eat, other Mandalorians will help you as long as your clans aren’t feuding. This could be in the form of shelters, meals, even healing. If the Mandalorians are of your clan or a clan friendly to you, they may be willing to help you even at cost to themselves.
